oneOf.title: CompatibilityConfig
oneOf.description: The compatibility configuration of the Hasura metadata.

date.description: Any backwards incompatible changes made to Hasura DDN after this date won't impact the metadata.

oneOf.title: AuthConfig
oneOf.description: Definition of the authentication configuration used by the API server.

definition.title: AuthConfigV1
definition.description: Definition of the authentication configuration used by the API server.

mode.title: AuthModeConfig
mode.description: The configuration for the authentication mode to use - webhook or JWT.

webhook.title: AuthHookConfig
webhook.description: The configuration of the authentication webhook.

url.description: The URL of the authentication webhook.

method.description: The HTTP method to be used to make the request to the auth hook.

jwt.title: JWTConfig
jwt.description: JWT config according to which the incoming JWT will be verified and decoded to extract the session variable claims.

audience.description: Optional validation to check that the `aud` field is a member of the `audience` recieved, otherwise will throw error.

issuer.description: Optional validation to check that the `iss` field is a member of the `iss` received, otherwise will throw error.

allowedSkew.description: Allowed leeway (in seconds) to the `exp` validation to account for clock skew.

claimsConfig.description: Claims config. Either specified via `claims_mappings` or `claims_namespace_path`

allOf.title: JWTClaimsConfig
allOf.description: Config to describe how/where the engine should look for the claims within the decoded token.

locations.title: JWTClaimsMap
locations.description: Can be used when Hasura claims are not all present in the single object, but individual claims are provided a JSON pointer within the decoded JWT and optionally a default value.

x-hasura-default-role.description: JSON pointer to lookup the default role within the decoded JWT.

oneOf.description: Literal value of the claims mapping
Look up the Hasura claims at the specified JSON Pointer and provide a default value if the lookup fails.

path.description: JSON pointer to find the particular claim in the decoded JWT token.

default.description: Default value to be used when no value is found when looking up the value using the `path`.

x-hasura-allowed-roles.description: JSON pointer to lookup the allowed roles within the decoded JWT.

oneOf.description: Literal value of the claims mapping
Look up the Hasura claims at the specified JSON Pointer and provide a default value if the lookup fails.

path.description: JSON pointer to find the particular claim in the decoded JWT token.

default.description: Default value to be used when no value is found when looking up the value using the `path`.

namespace.title: JWTClaimsNamespace
namespace.description: Used when all of the Hasura claims are present in a single object within the decoded JWT.

claimsFormat.description: Format in which the Hasura claims will be present.

oneOf.description: Claims will be in the JSON format.
Claims will be in the Stringified JSON format.

location.description: Pointer to lookup the Hasura claims within the decoded claims.

tokenLocation.description: Source of the JWT authentication token.

oneOf.description: Get the bearer token from the `Authorization` header.

oneOf.title: JWTCookieLocation
oneOf.description: Get the token from the Cookie header under the specificied cookie name.

oneOf.title: JWTHeaderLocation
oneOf.description: Custom header from where the header should be parsed from.

key.description: Mode according to which the JWT auth is configured.

allOf.title: JWTKey
allOf.description: JWT key configuration according to which the incoming JWT will be decoded.

oneOf.description: JWT mode when the algorithm `type` and `key` is known

fixed.title: JWTKeyConfig
fixed.description: JWT Secret config according to which the incoming JWT will be decoded.

algorithm.description: The algorithm used to decode the JWT.

allOf.title: JWTAlgorithm
allOf.description: The algorithm used to decode the JWT.

oneOf.description: HMAC using SHA-256
HMAC using SHA-384
HMAC using SHA-512
ECDSA using SHA-256
ECDSA using SHA-384
RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5 using SHA-256
RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5 using SHA-384
RSASSA-PKCS1-v1_5 using SHA-512
RSASSA-PSS using SHA-256
RSASSA-PSS using SHA-384
RSASSA-PSS using SHA-512
Edwards-curve Digital Signature Algorithm (EdDSA)

key.description: The key to use for decoding the JWT.

allOf.title: EnvironmentValue
allOf.description: Either a literal string or a reference to a Hasura secret

oneOf.description: JWT mode where the `type` and `key` parameters are obtained dynamically through JWK.

oneOf.title: DataConnectorLink
oneOf.description: Definition of a data connector, used to bring in sources of data and connect them to OpenDD models and commands.

definition.title: DataConnectorLinkV1
definition.description: Definition of a data connector - version 1.

name.description: The name of the data connector.

allOf.description: The name of a data connector.

url.description: The url(s) to access the data connector.

headers.description: Key value map of HTTP headers to be sent with each request to the data connector.

schema.description: The schema of the data connector. This schema is used as the source of truth when serving requests and the live schema of the data connector is not looked up.

oneOf.title: ObjectType
oneOf.description: Definition of a user-defined Open DD object type.

definition.title: ObjectTypeV1
definition.description: Definition of a user-defined Open DD object type.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The first name of the author

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The last name of the author

name.description: The name to give this object type, used to refer to it elsewhere in the metadata. Must be unique across all types defined in this subgraph.

allOf.description: The name of a user-defined type.

items.title: ObjectFieldDefinition
items.description: The definition of a field in a user-defined object type.

name.description: The name of the field. This name is used both when referring to the field elsewhere in the metadata and when creating the corresponding GraphQl type.

allOf.description: The name of a field in a user-defined object type.

type.description: The type of this field. This uses the GraphQL syntax to represent field types and must refer to one of the inbuilt OpenDd types or another user-defined type.

allOf.title: TypeReference
allOf.description:
A reference to an Open DD type including nullable values and arrays.
Suffix '!' to indicate a non-nullable reference, and wrap in '[]' to indicate an array.
Eg: '[String!]!' is a non-nullable array of non-nullable strings.

description.description: The description of this field. Gets added to the description of the field's definition in the graphql schema.

fields.description: The list of fields defined for this object type.

globalIdFields.description: The subset of fields that uniquely identify this object in the domain. Setting this property will automatically implement the GraphQL Relay Node interface for this object type and add an `id` global ID field. If setting this property, there must not be a field named `id` already present.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this object type should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: ObjectTypeGraphQLConfiguration
anyOf.description: GraphQL configuration of an Open DD object type.

typeName.description: The name to use for the GraphQL type representation of this object type when used in an output context.

inputTypeName.description: The name to use for the GraphQL type representation of this object type when used in an input context.

description.description: The description of the object. Gets added to the description of the object's definition in the graphql schema.

oneOf.title: ScalarType
oneOf.description: Definition of a user-defined scalar type that that has opaque semantics.

definition.title: ScalarTypeV1
definition.description: Definition of a user-defined scalar type that that has opaque semantics.

name.description: The name to give this scalar type, used to refer to it elsewhere in the metadata. Must be unique across all types defined in this subgraph.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this scalar type should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: ScalarTypeGraphQLConfiguration
anyOf.description: GraphQL configuration of an Open DD scalar type

typeName.description: The name of the GraphQl type to use for this scalar.

description.description: The description of this scalar. Gets added to the description of the scalar's definition in the graphql schema.

oneOf.title: DataConnectorScalarRepresentation
oneOf.description: The representation of a data connector scalar in terms of Open DD types

definition.title: DataConnectorScalarRepresentationV1
definition.description: The representation of a data connector scalar in terms of Open DD types

dataConnectorName.description: The name of the data connector that this scalar type comes from.

dataConnectorScalarType.description: The name of the scalar type coming from the data connector.

representation.description: The name of the Open DD type that this data connector scalar type should be represented as.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this scalar's operators should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: DataConnectorScalarGraphQLConfiguration
anyOf.description: GraphQL configuration of a data connector scalar

oneOf.title: Model
oneOf.description: The definition of a data model. A data model is a collection of objects of a particular type. Models can support one or more CRUD operations.

definition.title: ModelV1
definition.description: The definition of a data model. A data model is a collection of objects of a particular type. Models can support one or more CRUD operations.

selectUniques.description: Description for the select unique ArticleByID

selectMany.description: Description for the select many ArticleMany

name.description: The name of the data model.

objectType.description: The type of the objects of which this model is a collection.

globalIdSource.description: Whether this model should be used as the global ID source for all objects of its type.

items.title: ArgumentDefinition
items.description: The definition of an argument for a field, command, or model.

arguments.description: A list of arguments accepted by this model. Defaults to no arguments.

source.description: The source configuration for this model.

anyOf.title: ModelSource
anyOf.description: Description of how a model maps to a particular data connector

dataConnectorName.description: The name of the data connector backing this model.

collection.description: The collection in the data connector that backs this model.

typeMapping.description: How the various types used in this model correspond to entities in the data connector.

filterableFields.description: A list of fields that can be used to filter the objects in this model.

orderableFields.description: A list of fields that can be used to order the objects in this model.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this model should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: ModelGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of how a model appears in the GraphQL API.

selectUniques.description: Description for the select unique ArticleByID

selectMany.description: Description for the select many ArticleMany

items.title: SelectUniqueGraphQlDefinition
items.description: The definition of the GraphQL API for selecting a unique row/object from a model.

queryRootField.description: The name of the query root field for this API.

allOf.description: The name of a GraphQL object field.

uniqueIdentifier.description: A set of fields which can uniquely identify a row/object in the model.

description.description: The description of the select unique graphql definition of the model. Gets added to the description of the select unique root field of the model in the graphql schema.

selectUniques.description: For each select unique defined here, a query root field is added to the GraphQL API that can be used to select a unique object from the model.

selectMany.description: Select many configuration for a model adds a query root field to the GraphQl API that can be used to retrieve multiple objects from the model.

anyOf.title: SelectManyGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of the GraphQL API for selecting rows from a model.

queryRootField.description: The name of the query root field for this API.

description.description: The description of the select many graphql definition of the model. Gets added to the description of the select many root field of the model in the graphql schema.

argumentsInputType.description: The type name of the input type used to hold the arguments of the model.

filterExpressionType.description: The type name of the filter boolean expression input type.

orderByExpressionType.description: The type name of the order by expression input type.

description.description: The description of the model. Gets added to the description of the model in the graphql schema.

oneOf.title: Command
oneOf.description: The definition of a command. A command is a user-defined operation which can take arguments and returns an output. The semantics of a command are opaque to the Open DD specification.

definition.title: CommandV1
definition.description: Definition of an OpenDD Command, which is a custom operation that can take arguments and returns an output. The semantics of a command are opaque to OpenDD.

outputType.description: The return type of the command.

arguments.description: The list of arguments accepted by this command. Defaults to no arguments.

source.description: The source configuration for this command.

anyOf.title: CommandSource
anyOf.description: Description of how a command maps to a particular data connector

dataConnectorName.description: The name of the data connector backing this command.

dataConnectorCommand.description: The function/procedure in the data connector that backs this command.

function.description: The name of a function backing the command.

procedure.description: The name of a procedure backing the command.

typeMapping.description: How the various types used in this command correspond to entities in the data connector.

argumentMapping.description: Mapping from command argument names to data connector table argument names.

graphql.description: Configuration for how this command should appear in the GraphQL schema.

anyOf.title: CommandGraphQlDefinition
anyOf.description: The definition of how a command should appear in the GraphQL API.

rootFieldName.description: The name of the graphql root field to use for this command.

rootFieldKind.description: Whether to put this command in the Query or Mutation root of the GraphQL API.

description.description: The description of the command. Gets added to the description of the command's root field in the graphql schema.

oneOf.title: Relationship
oneOf.description: Definition of a relationship on an OpenDD type which allows it to be extended with related models or commands.

definition.title: RelationshipV1
definition.description: Definition of a relationship on an OpenDD type which allows it to be extended with related models or commands.

allOf.description: The name of the GraphQL relationship field.

source.description: The source type of the relationship.

model.title: ModelRelationshipTarget
model.description: The target model for a relationship.

name.description: The name of the data model.

subgraph.description: The subgraph of the target model. Defaults to the current subgraph.

relationshipType.description: Type of the relationship - object or array.

oneOf.description: Select one related object from the target.
Select multiple related objects from the target.

command.title: CommandRelationshipTarget
command.description: The target command for a relationship.

subgraph.description: The subgraph of the target command. Defaults to the current subgraph.

items.title: RelationshipMapping
items.description: Definition of a how a particular field in the source maps to a target field or argument.

source.description: The source configuration for this relationship mapping.

allOf.title: RelationshipMappingSource
allOf.description: The source configuration for a relationship mapping.

value.title: ValueExpression
value.description: An expression which evaluates to a value that can be used in permissions.

sessionVariable.description: Used to represent the name of a session variable, like "x-hasura-role".

target.description: The target configuration for this relationship mapping.

allOf.title: RelationshipMappingTarget
allOf.description: The target configuration for a relationship mapping.

mapping.description: The mapping configuration of source to target for the relationship.

description.description: The description of the relationship. Gets added to the description of the relationship in the graphql schema.

oneOf.title: TypePermissions
oneOf.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD type.

definition.title: TypePermissionsV1
definition.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD type.

typeName.description: The name of the type for which permissions are being defined. Must be an object type.

items.title: TypePermission
items.description: Defines permissions for a particular role for a type.

role.description: The role for which permissions are being defined.

output.description: Permissions for this role when this type is used in an output context. If null, this type is inaccessible for this role in an output context.

anyOf.title: TypeOutputPermission
anyOf.description: Permissions for a type for a particular role when used in an output context.

allowedFields.description: Fields of the type that are accessible for a role

permissions.description: A list of type permissions, one for each role.

oneOf.title: ModelPermissions
oneOf.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD model.

definition.title: ModelPermissionsV1
definition.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD model.

modelName.description: The name of the model for which permissions are being defined.

items.title: ModelPermission
items.description: Defines the permissions for an OpenDD model.

role.description: The role for which permissions are being defined.

select.description: The permissions for selecting from this model for this role. If this is null, the role is not allowed to query the model.

anyOf.title: SelectPermission
anyOf.description: Defines the permissions for selecting a model for a role.

filter.description: Filter expression when selecting rows for this model. Null filter implies all rows are selectable.

anyOf.title: ModelPredicate
anyOf.description: A predicate that can be used to restrict the objects returned when querying a model.

oneOf.description: Filters objects based on a field value.

fieldComparison.title: FieldComparisonPredicate
fieldComparison.description: Field comparision predicate filters objects based on a field value.

field.description: The field name of the object type of the model to compare.

operator.description: The name of the operator to use for comparison.

value.description: The value expression to compare against.

oneOf.description: Filters objects based on the relationship of a model.

relationship.title: RelationshipPredicate
relationship.description: Relationship predicate filters objects of a source model based on a predicate on the related model.

name.description: The name of the relationship of the object type of the model to follow.

predicate.description: The predicate to apply on the related objects. If this is null, then the predicate evaluates to true as long as there is at least one related object present.

oneOf.title: And
oneOf.description: Evaluates to true if all sub-predicates evaluate to true.

oneOf.title: Or
oneOf.description: Evaluates to true if any of the sub-predicates evaluate to true.

oneOf.title: Not
oneOf.description: Evaluates to true if the sub-predicate evaluates to false.

permissions.description: A list of model permissions, one for each role.

oneOf.title: CommandPermissions
oneOf.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD command.

definition.title: CommandPermissionsV1
definition.description: Definition of permissions for an OpenDD command.

commandName.description: The name of the command for which permissions are being defined.

items.title: CommandPermission
items.description: Defines the permissions for a role for a command.

role.description: The role for which permissions are being defined.

allowExecution.description: Whether the command is executable by the role.

permissions.description: A list of command permissions, one for each role.
